doc.abstracts: This report provides an overview of events spanning the period July 1, 1993 to June 30, 1994, together with accompanying administrative budgets and audited financial statements. The report highlights the Bank's commitment to poverty alleviation. Region specific summaries of lending activity by IBRD and IDA are also provided.
